DemoPages.Title: Blazor UI Components
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, overview, getting started, devexpress, demo

DemoPages.Title: Column Types
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, column type, columns, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid provides you with column objects to display and edit different data types: text, numbers, dates, and Boolean values.

DemoPages.Title: Sort Data
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, grid sort, grid sorting, datagrid sort, datagrid sorting, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid supports sorting data against multiple columns. A column's current sort order is indicated by a sort glyph displayed in the column header.

DemoPages.Title: Data Filter Row
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, grid filter, grid filtering, datagrid filter, datagrid filtering, data filter, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid displays the Filter Row that allows users to filter data as they type text in cells. An additional drop-down menu also displays a list of filter conditions.

DemoPages.Title: Templates
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, template, cell template, cell editor template, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid supports templates that allow you to customize cell appearance and visual layout of the edit form.

DemoPages.Title: Cascading Editors
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, cascade editors, cascading combobox, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid allows you to implement cascade logic within grid’s edit form using DevExpress ComboBox for Blazor components.

DemoPages.Title: Edit Form Validation
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, template, form validation, form template, form template validation, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid allows you to implement a custom edit form with built-in data validation.

DemoPages.Title: Large Data Source
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, data bind, data binding, entity framework bind, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid delivers high performance when the component is bound to a large data source.

DemoPages.Title: Scrolling
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, scrolling, vertical scrolling, horizontal scrolling, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor displays a large amount of information thanks to vertical and horizontal scroll bars.

DemoPages.Title: Virtual Scrolling
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, virtual scrolling, horizontal scrolling, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid supports Virtual Scrolling. When Virtual Scrolling mode is activated, the grid loads new/additional data on demand when a user scrolls grid rows.

DemoPages.Title: Master-Detail View
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, master grid, detail grid, master-detail relationship, master-detail view, detail row, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor component allows you to build master-detail layouts and relationships of any complexity and depth with a detail row template.

DemoPages.Title: Grouping
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, grouping, groups, drag-and-drop, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor component enables you to drag-and-drop grid headers or use grouping API to group data against multiple data columns.

DemoPages.Title: Selection
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, selection, multi-selection, multiple-selection, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor component supports Single Row, Multiple Rows, and Multiple Rows with Optimized Performance selection modes.

DemoPages.Title: Overview
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, pivot grid, pivot table, sorting, grouping, sub-totals, grand-totals, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Pivot Grid summarizes data from the underlying data source and presents the results in cross-tabulated format.

DemoPages.Title: Templates
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, pivot grid, pivot table, customization, cell templates, formatting, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Pivot Grid allows you to use native Razor markup to define custom templates for grid fields.

DemoPages.Title: Large Data Source
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, pivot grid, pivot table, data binding, entity framework bind, paging, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Pivot Grid delivers high performance when the component is bound to a large data source.

DemoPages.Title: Chart Integration
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, pivot grid, pivot table, charts, pivot grid and chart integration, data visualization, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The DevExpress Pivot Grid for Blazor can be easily integrated with DevExpress Charts for Blazor. This allows you to visualize grid's data on a chart.

DemoPages.Title: Series Types
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, charts, bar, line, area, bubble, series, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts supports the following series types: Line, Area, Bar, and Bubble series.

DemoPages.Title: Dynamic Series
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, charts, dynamic series, series template, aggregation, grouping, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts allows you to dynamically select data that matches the specified criterion from a data source and display chart series based on this data.

DemoPages.Title: Customization
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, charts, customization, tooltips, legend, toggle series, multiple axes, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts allows users to customize tooltips and legend items. Additionally, the component supports displaying charts with multiple axes that help to combine several charts.

DemoPages.Title: Range Series
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, charts, range series, range area, range bar, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts supports Range Bar and Range Area series that display value ranges corresponding to argument values.

DemoPages.Title: Financial Series
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, charts, candlestick, stock, financial, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts supports Candlestick and Stock series that display how financial indicators change in time.

DemoPages.Title: Pie Series
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, charts, pie, donut, doughnut, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts supports Pie and Donut series that allow you to compare the percentage values of different point arguments and illustrate these values as pie slices.

DemoPages.Title: View Types
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, scheduler, day view, work week view, week view, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The Scheduler UI for Blazor can display regular and recurrent appointments in a Day, Work Week or Week View. The Scheduler also allows users to create, remove, and manage appointments.

DemoPages.Title: Recurring Appointments
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, scheduler, recurring appointments, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The Scheduler UI for Blazor can display regular and recurrent appointments in a Day, Work Week or Week View. The Scheduler also allows users to create, remove, and manage appointments.

DemoPages.Title: ComboBox
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, combo box, combobox, data binding, databinding, data source, virtual scrolling, scrolling, custom input, filtering, data filtering, incremental filtering, null text, nulltext, cascading lists,  devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor ComboBox is a drop-down list editor that supports virtual scrolling, incremental filtering, and cascade logic.

DemoPages.Title: Spin Edit
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, spinedit, spin edit, number editor, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Spin Edit allows the user to modify numeric data by typing a new value into the text box or by using the up/down spin buttons to increment/decrement the value.

DemoPages.Title: Date Edit
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, date edit, dateedit, date, calendar, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Date Edit is a date editor with a drop-down calendar. The component allows you to enter a date into the text box or pick one from the drop-down window.

DemoPages.Title: Text Box
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, text box, textbox, memo, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Text Box is a single-line editor that enables a user to enter and edit text. The component also supports binding to a data source and password mode.

DemoPages.Title: Calendar
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, calendar, date, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Calendar allows users to select dates and navigate through months and years. The component supports multiple date selection and cell customization.

DemoPages.Title: List Box
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, list box, listbox, list editor, readonly list, read-only list, data binding, databinding, data source, virtual scrolling, scrolling, select, select multiple, select option checkbox, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor List Box allows users to select items from a list of predefined strings. The component supports multiple item selection, virtual scrolling and read-only mode.

DemoPages.Title: Form Layout
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, form, form editor, form layout, formlayout, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Form Layout allows you to construct responsive and automatically-aligned edit forms. Form Layout can group items, display UI elements in tabs. You can also bind the component to a data source.

DemoPages.Title: TreeView
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, treeview, tree view, tree component, navigation, tree navigation, selection, node selection, hierarchical data binding, hierarchical databinding, binding to hierarchical data, hierarchical data source, hierarchy, nodes, display master-detail data, display master-detail object, display master-detail objects, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor TreeView displays hierarchical data structures within a tree-like UI. The component supports data binding and master-detail relationships.

DemoPages.Title: Tabs
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, tab, tabs, tabcontrol, tab control, pagecontrol, page control, page component, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Tabs allows you to implement tabbed layout and control an active tab from code. You can also use this component to emulate a Page control in your Blazor application.

DemoPages.Title: Pager
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, pager, pages, pager component, pages component, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Pager enables data navigation and helps visualize a current position within a bound data source. The component allows you to set up the total number of pages and the number of visible page numbers.

DemoPages.Title: Popup
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, popup, window, dialog, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Popup is a pop-up window that overlays the current view. The component consists of a customizable header and pop-up body.

DemoPages.Title: Form Validation
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, form, form validation, data validation, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The DevExpress UI components for Blazor support the built-in form validation. You can validate DevExpress Blazor data editors, Form Layout, or  your custom edit form.
